}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "5184-5953", "©2010 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P.", :and "[G]48RNAA0P.SGC" is silkscreened on the board.
"48DNXA07.SGB", "(XB114_030)", "2010/05/31" is silkscreened :on the wireless modules ([[Atheros]] XB114 reference design).
This matches with [[Unex]]'s ( / ''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'''s) [http://www.unex.com.tw/product/dnxa-h1 DNXA-H1]. :Three ''[[SiGe]]'' SE2595L Front-ends (FEM) are used per card.
* WLAN Radio Module - Model: [[HP MRLBB-1003]] {{See also|HP MRLBB-1301}}
The CPU may be a [[Freescale]] chip (P1020 PSE2HPA). :''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' is the presumed manufacturer. {{See also|Aerohive HiveAP 330|Aerohive HiveAP 350}}
The same hardware is used for the MSM430, MSM460, and MSM466. *The MSM430 is a two-stream only device (integral antennas). *The MSM460 is dual-band 3x3:3 capable with integral antennas. *The MSM466 is dual-band 3x3:3 device (multi-5GHz capable) :with RP-SMA connectors.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' ([[NXP]]) P1020 @667MHz :SoC: Dual-core ''PowerPC'' *Flash: 128MB (NAND) *Memory: 256MB (DDR3) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9390 :802.11abgn (2.4GHz) 3x3:3 :[[Atheros]] AR9390 :802.11an (5GHz) 3x3:3 *Network: 1x GbE port *Power Source: 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== [https://support.hpe.com/hpesc/public/docDisplay?docId=c03127714&docLocale=en_US Product page] {{•}} [https://www.hpe.com/psnow/doc/c04915286 Quick-start Guide] [http://content.etilize.com/User-Manual/1019134534.pdf Quick-start guide]

==See also== :;[https://habr.com/ru/company/hpe/blog/154409/ Hewlett Packard Enterprise AP] *[[HP MSM310 (9379B)]] - Access Point (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g, 2x ext. ant., 54Mbps *[[HP MSM317 (J9423A)]] - Access Device (WW) :Indoor, 5x FE, 1x 802.11a/b/g, 2x int. ant., 54Mbps *[[HP MSM410 (J9427B)]] - Access Point (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g/n, 3x int. ant., 300Mbps *[[HP MSM430 (J9651A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 1x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x int. ant., 600Mbps *[[HP MSM460 (J9591A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x int. ant., 900Mbps *[[HP MSM466 (J9621A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Indoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x ext. ant., 900Mbps *[[HP MSM466-R (J9716A)]] - Dual Radio 802.11n AP (WW) :Outdoor, 2x 802.11a/b/g/n, 6x ext. ant., 900Mbps
